    • Method Detail

      • writeCSVFile

        public static void writeCSVFile(AttributeTable table,
                File file,
                Character separator,
                Charset charset,
                Integer[] columnsToExport,
                Attributable[] rows)
                         throws IOException

        Export a AttributeTable to the specified file.

        Parameters:
        table - Table to export
        file - File to write
        separator - Separator to use for separating values of a row in the CSV file. If null ',' will be used.
        charset - Charset encoding for the file
        columnsToExport - Indicates the indexes of the columns to export. All columns will be exported if null
        Throws:
        IOException - When an error happens while writing the file
